trap_clauses.text: This Agreement will automatically renew for successive one-year terms unless cancelled in writing 30 days prior to the renewal date.
We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time without prior notice to you.
By continuing to use the Service, you agree to any changes made to this Agreement.
You agree to resolve any disputes exclusively through binding arbitration and waive your right to a trial by jury.
The Company may terminate this Agreement at its sole discretion without notice or cause.
Failure to cancel the subscription before the trial ends will result in automatic billing of the full monthly rate.
You authorize us to charge any applicable fees, including late payment or processing charges, to your default payment method.
We may collect, use, and share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes without additional consent.
We are not responsible for any damages, including incidental or consequential damages, arising from the use of this service.
You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Company and its affiliates from any claims or damages resulting from your use of the Service.
All intellectual property rights remain with the Company, including any content or feedback submitted by you.
We may suspend or limit your access to the Service for any reason, without liability or notice.
You waive your right to participate in any class action or representative lawsuit.
Any dispute shall be governed exclusively by the laws of [State/Country], without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
We are not obligated to provide refunds under any circumstances.
You acknowledge that prices, features, and availability are subject to change without notice.
We are not responsible for the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any third-party content or links.
Use of the Service is at your sole risk and provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis.
We may assign or transfer this Agreement without your consent.
You may not assign or transfer your rights under this Agreement without our prior written approval.
By clicking 'I Agree,' you consent to receiving promotional emails and communications from our partners.
You agree that your data may be transferred to and stored in jurisdictions with less protective privacy laws.
We reserve the right to deny service to anyone for any reason at any time.
Your continued use of the product constitutes your agreement to these and any future terms.
You are solely responsible for complying with all applicable laws and regulations when using this service.
By using this app, you grant us access to your contacts, camera, microphone, and location even when not in use.
We may continue to use and store your data even after you delete your account.
You agree that any content you upload becomes the property of the platform and may be used for promotional or commercial purposes.
We may send push notifications and SMS messages for marketing purposes, which you cannot opt out of.
Your data may be combined with information from public sources or third parties to build a user profile.
You agree that we may share anonymized or aggregated data with our business partners without limitation.
This device automatically transmits usage data and diagnostic reports to the manufacturer.
We may throttle, limit, or reduce the quality of your service at our discretion during peak usage.
By participating in this offer, you agree to enroll in a monthly subscription after the trial ends.
You are responsible for monitoring changes to these terms, which will be posted on our website.
Refunds are only available in the form of store credit and are subject to our approval.
In the event of a dispute, our determination will be final and binding.
We reserve the right to change the pricing of our services at any time without notifying you.
This app continues to run in the background and collects activity data even when closed.
Your uploaded photos may be used to train our AI systems.
We may access, read, preserve, and disclose any information we believe is necessary to comply with legal obligations or protect our interests.
By accepting this offer, you agree to receive promotional calls from our affiliates, regardless of your DND registration.
Your purchase includes automatic enrollment in our extended warranty plan at an additional monthly cost.
We may automatically install updates or features that alter how the product functions.
You agree that any disputes will be resolved individually and not as part of a class, consolidated, or representative action.
We do not guarantee compatibility of this product with future versions of your operating system.
You acknowledge that the availability of features may vary based on geographic location or third-party restrictions.
We are not responsible for any loss, damage, or injury caused by the use or misuse of our product.
You agree to waive any rights you may have under applicable data protection or privacy laws.
This app requires access to your social media accounts to function properly.
